headline: Soul Searching for Soulmates Brady and Belichick
abstract: Brady, 42, is set to become a free agent after he and his team finished a season that was subpar by the standards of their dynasty.
lead_paragraph: After Mo Lewis of the Jets delivered a crushing hit on Drew Bledsoe of the Patriots on Sept. 23, 2001, New England turned to a sixth-round draft pick named Tom Brady to take over as quarterback.
